info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:14PM EDT until July 13 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Schenectady County in east central New York... Western Albany County in east central New York... Southern Saratoga County in east central New York... Schoharie County in east central New York... Southeastern Montgomery County in eastern New York... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 613 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hagaman to near Jefferson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Amsterdam, Scotia, Mechanicville, Jefferson, Glenville, Niskayuna, Duanesburg, Berne, Altamont, Middleburgh, Gilboa, Schoharie, Round Lake, Delanson, Breakabeen, Rotterdam Junction and East Glenville. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
